alert.note: Alert for Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 6:38PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rapides and southeastern Vernon Parishes through 715 PM CST... At 637 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elmer to 8 miles northeast of Elizabeth. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Glenmora, Cheneyville, Alexandria International Airport, Hineston, Ball, Lecompte, Tioga, Esler Regional Airport, Otis, Elmer, Kingsville, Sieper, Poland, Kolin, Ruby, Holloway, Deville and Libuse. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 56 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
